Unknown0: |cffffd100Tip:|r Your spell casting can be cancelled by moving, jumping or hitting the escape key.
|cffffd100Tip:|r Press the 'M' key to see your map.
|cffffd100Tip:|r You can <Control>Click on an item to see how you would look wearing that item.
|cffffd100Tip:|r An item with its name in gray is a poor quality item and generally should be sold to a vendor.
|cffffd100Tip:|r An item with its name in white is useful to players in some way and can be used or sold at the auction house.
|cffffd100Tip:|r You can send mail to other players on your realm or even to your other characters from any mailbox in game.
|cffffd100Tip:|r You can <Shift>Click on an item to place an item link into a chat message.
|cffffd100Tip:|r All of your action bars can have their hotkeys remapped in the key bindings interface.
|cffffd100Tip:|r If a target on your minimap is gray, it's inside a cave or interior place you aren't currently in.
|cffffd100Tip:|r You can perform many fun actions with the emote system, for instance you can type /dance to dance.
|cffffd100Tip:|r The interface options menu <ESC> has lots of ways to customize your game options.
|cffffd100Tip:|r A mail icon next to the minimap means you have new mail. Visit a mailbox to retrieve it.
|cffffd100Tip:|r You can add additional action bars to your game interface from the interface options menu.
|cffffd100Tip:|r If you hold down <Shift> while right-clicking on a target to loot, you will automatically loot all items on the target.
|cffffd100Tip:|r If you enjoyed playing with someone from your realm, put them on your friends list!
|cffffd100Tip:|r Don't be shy to help a stranger, you'll both get loot and quest credit!
|cffffd100Tip:|r If you never want to hear from another player again, you can /ignore them. You can always change your mind later.
|cffffd100Tip:|r You can target members of your party with the function keys. F1 targets you; F2 targets the second party member.
|cffffd100Tip:|r Being polite while in a group with others will get you invited back!
|cffffd100Tip:|r You can click on a faction in the reputation pane to get additional information and options about that faction.
|cffffd100Tip:|r A monster with a silver dragon around its portrait is a rare monster with better than average treasure.
|cffffd100Tip:|r Use the mouse wheel on your main map to zoom in for a closer view of a zone.
|cffffd100Tip:|r You can lock your action bar so you don't accidentally move spells. This is done using the interface options menu.
|cffffd100Tip:|r You can cast a spell on yourself without deselecting your current target by holding down <Alt> while pressing your hotkey.
|cffffd100Tip:|r Completing quests and dungeons are the best way to gain levels.
|cffffd100Tip:|r You can hide your interface with <Alt>Z and take screenshots with <Print Screen>.
|cffffd100Tip:|r Right click on the main map to zoom out to the continent or world view, left click to zoom in.
|cffffd100Tip:|r If you <Shift>Click on a player name in the chat window it tells you additional information about them.
|cffffd100Tip:|r  A blue question mark above a quest giver means the quest is repeatable.
|cffffd100Tip:|r You can use the Tab key to select nearby enemies in front of you.
|cffffd100Tip:|r <Shift>Clicking on an item being sold by a vendor will let you select how many of that item you wish to purchase.
|cffffd100Tip:|r When you learn a profession or secondary skill the button that allows you to perform that skill is found in the Professions tab of your spellbook.
|cffffd100Tip:|r If you are having trouble finding something in a capital city, try clicking on a guard for directions.
|cffffd100Tip:|r Remember to take all things in moderation (even World of Warcraft!)
|cffffd100Tip:|r You can <Shift>Click on an item stack to split it into smaller stacks.
|cffffd100Tip:|r Pressing both mouse buttons simultaneously is another way to make your character move forward.
|cffffd100Tip:|r When replying to a tell from a player (Default 'R'), the <TAB> key cycles through people you have recently replied to.
|cffffd100Tip:|r You can remove a friendly spell enhancement on yourself by right-clicking on the spell effect icon.
|cffffd100Tip:|r Clicking an item linked by another player in chat will tell you more about the item.
|cffffd100Tip:|r You can only know two professions at a time, but you can learn all of the secondary skills (Archaeology, Fishing, Cooking and First Aid).
|cffffd100Tip:|r It's considered polite to talk to someone before inviting them into a group, or opening a trade window.
|cffffd100Tip:|r Your items do not suffer durability damage when you are killed by an enemy player.
|cffffd100Tip:|r <Shift>click on a quest in your quest log to toggle quest tracking for that quest.
|cffffd100Tip:|r Nearby questgivers that are awaiting your return are shown as a yellow question mark on your mini-map.
|cffffd100Tip:|r Nearby questgivers that are awaiting your return are shown as a question mark on your mini-map.
|cffffd100Tip:|r You can click the numbered quest icons in the quest tracker UI to select which quest to track.
|cffffd100Tip:|r Quests completed at maximum level award gold instead of experience.
|cffffd100Tip:|r You can join a party and quest with players from other realms, invite your friends!
|cffffd100Tip:|r By default, the B key will open all your bags at once.
|cffffd100Tip:|r When interacting with other players a little kindness goes a long way!
|cffffd100Tip:|r You're much less likely to encounter wandering monsters while following a road.
|cffffd100Tip:|r Use the Dungeon Finder tool to quickly travel to dungeons or to find more players for your dungeon group.
|cffffd100Tip:|r Bring your friends to Azeroth, but don't forget to go outside Azeroth with them as well.
|cffffd100Tip:|r If you keep an empty mailbox, the mail icon will let you know when you have new mail waiting!
|cffffd100Tip:|r Never give another player your account information.
|cffffd100Tip:|r Sharing an account with someone else can compromise its security.
|cffffd100Tip:|r A monster with a gray health bar will provide no loot or experience from killing it.

|cffffd100Tip:|r You can access the map either by clicking the map button in the upper right of the mini-map or by hitting the 'M' key. The map can help you locate where you need to go to complete a quest.
|cffffd100Tip:|r High level dungeons often have a heroic difficulty mode. These settings are tuned for powerful players that have improved loot.
|cffffd100Tip:|r When using Dungeon Finder, you can teleport into your dungeon. If not, you can use Dungeon meeting stones to summon absent party members.
|cffffd100Tip:|r The Parental Controls section of the Account Management site offers tools to help you manage play time.
|cffffd100Tip:|r <Shift> Click World Quests to track more than one.
|cffffd100Tip:|r A quest marked as (Failed) in the quest log can be reacquired from the quest giver.
|cffffd100Tip:|r The number next to the quest name in your quest log is how many other party members are on that quest.
|cffffd100Tip:|r You cannot advance quests other than (Raid) quests while you are in a raid group.
|cffffd100Tip:|r You cannot cancel your bids in the auction house, so bid carefully.
|cffffd100Tip:|r To enter a chat channel, type /join [channel name] and /leave [channel name] to exit.
|cffffd100Tip:|r Mail will be kept for a maximum of 30 days before it disappears.
|cffffd100Tip:|r It is possible to change the look of your armor or weapons by visiting a Transmogrifier in major cities.
|cffffd100Tip:|r You can repurchase items you have recently sold to a vendor from the buyback tab.
|cffffd100Tip:|r A group leader can reset their instances or change dungeon difficulty by Right Clicking on their character portrait.
|cffffd100Tip:|r You can always get a new Hearthstone from any innkeeper.
|cffffd100Tip:|r Smile early and often!
|cffffd100Tip:|r Players cannot dodge, parry, or block attacks that come from behind them.
|cffffd100Tip:|r You can replace a gem that is already socketed into your item by dropping a new gem on top of it in the socketing interface.
|cffffd100Tip:|r If you Right Click on a name in the combat log a list of options will appear.
|cffffd100Tip:|r You can only have one Battle Elixir and one Guardian Elixir on you at a time.
|cffffd100Tip:|r When you are mousing over an item, you can hold down the shift key and it will also show you the item of that type you have equipped.
|cffffd100Tip:|r You can have up to 12 characters per realm, with a maximum of 50 characters total across all realms.
|cffffd100Tip:|r You can reuse text that you have recently typed. Press Enter, then use <Alt> + Up Arrow to scroll through your previous messages.
|cffffd100Tip:|r Most mounts and pets are shared across all of your characters.
|cffffd100Tip:|r Thank you for playing World of Warcraft! You rock!
|cffffd100Tip:|r Conquer the enemy faction to get to Honor Level 50.
|cffffd100Tip:|r Flying mounts can be used at higher level.
|cffffd100Tip:|r Completing some Achievements may grant unique non-combat items as rewards.

|cffffd100Tip:|r Dealing damage, healing or casting spells can generate Threat against a creature.  Most creatures will attack the player with the highest Threat against them. When in a group, you want the character with the most Threat to be a tank.
|cffffd100Tip:|r Mythic dungeons are a great way to have epic (or even Legendary) adventures with your friends!
|cffffd100Tip:|r Create a level 100 class trial character to try the class out for an extended period of time.
|cffffd100Tip:|r You can have your hair cut, colored or styled in a Barber Shop located in many cities.
|cffffd100Tip:|r Recruiting a friend to World of Warcraft can provide rewards for both of you.
|cffffd100Tip:|r Heroic Dungeons require a minimum quality of gear before you can enter them with Dungeon Finder, but you can bypass that requirement with a full group of friends.
|cffffd100Tip:|r Almost all loot can be awarded with increased power, sometimes greatly.
|cffffd100Tip:|r Legendary items can come from anywhere, but more difficult activities reward them much more often.
|cffffd100Tip:|r You can use the Calendar to see upcoming holidays or plan events with your guild or friends.
|cffffd100Tip:|r You can Right Click on the Clock to set an alarm or display a stopwatch.
|cffffd100Tip:|r If you find yourself alone, riding in green fields with the sun on your face, do not be troubled - for you are in Azeroth!
|cffffd100Tip:|r If you're looking for something different to do, try to complete some of the more unusual Achievements.
|cffffd100Tip:|r You can link quests, items, and achievements to chat messages by starting a chat line then Shift-Left Clicking the item.
|cffffd100Tip:|r You can track progress on current quests or achievements using shift-click.
|cffffd100Tip:|r You can track many things, such as low-level quests or vendors by clicking on the magnifying glass near your mini map.
|cffffd100Tip:|r A Sanctuary is an area in which Player vs. Player combat is prohibited, such as Shattrath or Dalaran.
|cffffd100Tip:|r Improving your reputation with a faction can grant access to new items.
|cffffd100Tip:|r The Calendar can tell you when raids reset. Your raid leader can choose to extend a raid.
|cffffd100Tip:|r If you are having difficulty with a group of creatures in a dungeon, try using a crowd control ability, such as Polymorph or Sap.
|cffffd100Tip:|r Targets in your minimap have an up or down caret to indicate that they're above or below you.
|cffffd100Tip:|r You can use the Equipment Manager feature to quickly swap sets of gear that you find yourself using often.
|cffffd100Tip:|r You can enable Arena Enemy Frames to display the unit frames of the enemy team when in Arena matches.
|cffffd100Tip:|r If you press <Alt> while your cursor is over an item slot on your character, you can produce a list of items that can be equipped in that slot.
|cffffd100Tip:|r If an enemy cast bar is gray or has a shield icon around it, that means you cannot interrupt the spell with your abilities.
|cffffd100Tip:|r Your guild can schedule Guild Events using the in-game calendar. You choose to sign up for these events rather than waiting for an invitation.
|cffffd100Tip:|r When the autocomplete feature suggests character names, you can use Tab or <Shift> Tab to select a name from the list.
|cffffd100Tip:|r Always verify that you are accessing an official Blizzard website whenever submitting account information.
|cffffd100Tip:|r Emails from Blizzard will always end in either blizzard.com or battle.net.
|cffffd100Tip:|r There are six branches of Pandaren Cooking.  You can choose to pursue one, or to master them all.
|cffffd100Tip:|r Using the Battle.net Mobile Authenticator will help protect your World of Warcraft account from theft.
|cffffd100Tip:|r To avoid account theft, do not login to World of Warcraft on a computer that is shared with the general public. These machines can be infected with malicious software.
|cffffd100Tip:|r Be wary of unofficial sites advertising paid World of Warcraft services. These may contain malicious software that can lead to account theft.
|cffffd100Tip:|r To avoid account theft, do not use browser add-ons or features that allow scripts to be run in the background.
|cffffd100Tip:|r Quest locations and questgivers can be seen on your map.
|cffffd100Tip:|r You can earn rewards for running random dungeons using the Dungeon Finder tool. You can go with a group of friends or use Dungeon Finder to find a dungeon group.
|cffffd100Tip:|r You can turn your character by holding the Right Mouse Button and moving the mouse. You can look around by holding the Left Mouse Button and moving the mouse.
|cffffd100Tip:|r There are many activities you can do at max level, such as world quests, dungeons, raids, or battlegrounds.
|cffffd100Tip:|r Don't stand in the fire!

|cffffd100Tip:|r The War Games feature allows your group leader to challenge another group to an Arena or Battleground skirmish of their choice. War Games can be started from the Player vs. Player screen <H>.
|cffffd100Tip:|r It is possible to change the look of your armor or weapons by visiting a Transmogrifier in major cities.
|cffffd100Tip:|r You can use Raid Finder to join a 25-player raid for some of the most epic experiences World of Warcraft has to offer.
|cffffd100Tip:|r You can queue for Scenarios to run short group content.
|cffffd100Tip:|r Most achievements are account-wide. If you have earned the points on one of your characters, they will all share the points.
|cffffd100Tip:|r Visit a Pet Battle Trainer if you want to collect and battle companion pets.
|cffffd100Tip:|r You can't fly in Pandaria until you reach level 90.
|cffffd100Tip:|r Nobody has seen Alleria or Turalyon in years... until now!
|cffffd100Tip:|r Companion pets are account-wide. If one of your characters has a pet, all your characters can use that pet.
|cffffd100Tip:|r You can drag ability icons from the spellbook, spec page, talent page down onto your action bars.
|cffffd100Tip:|r You make a new character to try out a different race, class or faction. Many players call these characters "alts."
|cffffd100Tip:|r The tank role focuses on controlling enemy creatures during group play. Tanks sacrifice high damage for high survivability.
|cffffd100Tip:|r The healer role focuses on keeping themselves and other members of the group alive.
|cffffd100Tip:|r The damage role (sometimes called "DPS") focuses on defeating the enemy. Damage dealers are supported by tanks and healers.
|cffffd100Tip:|r The Cooking trainers in Pandaria, located in the Halfhill Market in Valley of the Four Winds, can teach you to cook no matter how inexperienced you are.
|cffffd100Tip:|r The Archaeology trainers in Pandaria are located in the Seat of Knowledge in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms.
|cffffd100Tip:|r The Inscription trainers in Pandaria are located in the library in the Temple of the Jade Serpent.
|cffffd100Tip:|r Stuck on a quest? Can't find that one NPC? Looking for stats on an item? The WoW forums and other fansites are great resources for all things WoW!
|cffffd100Tip:|r There are six branches of Pandaren Cooking.  You can choose to pursue one, or to master them all.
|cffffd100Tip:|r Brann Bronzebeard at the Seat of Knowledge will trade you fragments from other branches of Archaeology for your finds in Pandaria.
|cffffd100Tip:|r You can choose to receive loot for a different class specialization by Right Clicking on the character frame and choosing Loot Specialization.
|cffffd100Tip:|r Normal and Heroic Raids scale to suit groups containing anywhere from 10 to 30 players, including Real ID and BattleTag friends, so no one has to be left out!
|cffffd100Tip:|r Look for the Toy Box inside your Collections menu.  All your cosmetic items and toys are automatically stored there once collected.
|cffffd100Tip:|r Draenor Perks are class enhancements that unlock in random order as you level in Warlords of Draenor.
|cffffd100Tip:|r Profession buildings in your Garrison allow you to craft items from all tradeskills, not just those your character has learned.
|cffffd100Tip:|r Your Garrison serves as your base of operations in Draenor.  Upgrade it and recruit an army of followers to crush your enemies and earn rewards!
|cffffd100Tip:|r Using Dungeon Finder with a group of friends grants you additional bonus gold.
|cffffd100Tip:|r Item attributes that are grayed out do not contribute to your character's power.
|cffffd100Tip:|r Group Finder allows you to create and find groups for any dungeons, raids or quests.
|cffffd100Tip:|r Your Garrison serves as your base of operations in Draenor.  Upgrade it and recruit an army of followers to crush your enemies and earn rewards!
|cffffd100Tip:|r Right-Click on your portrait while in a group to view your party leader's Garrison.
